name: Sumora
description: Sumora is a utility token designed to power innovative AI-driven solutions and interactions. By facilitating seamless transactions and access to advanced features, Sumora bridges the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical use cases. Built with a focus on scalability, transparency, and community-driven growth, Sumora aims to democratize access to AI and empower developers, businesses, and users to harness the potential of large language models (LLMs) and other AI technologies.
